item.title: 2022 02 trade records & summary
item.description: 2022-02 Monthly Summary OXY contributed $6927.90 in total. The sum of long-Term gains from OXY, ACH, GDX are around $9167. All other short-term gains are around $7889 2022-02-28 Dow -0.49% Nasdaq +0.41% S&P 500 -0.24% 2022-02-25 Dow +2.51% Nasdaq +1.64% S&P 500 +2.24% 2022-02-24 Dow +0.28% Nasdaq +3.34% S&P 500 +1.50% The WAR is on between Russia and Ukraine. 2022-02-23 Dow -1.38% Nasdaq -2.57% S&P 500 -1.
